RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', GeneratorPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorFrameCount AS 'Generator Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Generator Sig Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.SigFrameCount AS 'Rx Sig Count (Frames)', (GeneratorPortResults.TotalOctetCount * 8) AS 'Total Tx Count (bits)', (AnalyzerPortResults.TotalOctetCount * 8) AS 'Total Rx Count (bits)', GeneratorPortResults.L1BitCount AS 'Tx L1 Count (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.L1BitCount AS 'Rx L1 Count (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.MinFrameLength AS 'Rx Min FrameLength', AnalyzerPortResults.MaxFrameLength AS 'Rx Max FrameLength', GeneratorPortResults.TotalCellCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Cells)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalCellCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Cells)' FROM Port, GeneratorPortResults, Generator, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Generator.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND GeneratorPortResults.ParentHnd = Generator.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND GeneratorPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Generator.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )

RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', GeneratorPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.FcsErrorFrameCount AS 'Rx FCS Error Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorCrcErrorFrameCount AS 'Generator CRC Error Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorL3ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Generator L3 Checksum Error Count', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorL4ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Generator L4 Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.Ipv4ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx IPv4 Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.TcpChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx TCP Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.UdpChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx UDP Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsFillOctetCount AS 'Rx PRBS Fill Octet Count', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsBitErrorCount AS 'Rx PRBS Bit Error Count', coalesce(round(cast(AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsBitErrorCount as double)/cast((AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsFillOctetCount * 8) as double), 3), 0.0) as 'PRBS Bit Error Ratio', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsErrorFrameCount AS 'Rx PRBS Error Frame Count' FROM Port, GeneratorPortResults, Generator, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Generator.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND GeneratorPortResults.ParentHnd = Generator.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND GeneratorPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Generator.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )

RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecSymbols AS 'Corrected RS FEC Bits (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreRsFecSerRate AS 'Pre RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostRsFecSerRate AS 'Post RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Pre Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Post Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)' FROM Port, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId ) UNION SELECT ExternalDevicePort.Name AS 'Port Name', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecSymbols AS 'Corrected RS FEC Bits (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreRsFecSerRate AS 'Pre RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostRsFecSerRate AS 'Post RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Pre Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Post Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)' FROM ExternalDevicePort, AnalyzerPortResults, Port, Analyzer WHERE ( Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND ExternalDevicePort.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.Name: RealTimeResultGroupDefinition 10

SequencerComment.Text: Check the input enable load and test criteria flags
SequencerComment.Name: Comment

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN ((CASE WHEN En.EnableCpuLoad='1' AND Cpu.EnableCpuTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad='1' AND Mem.EnableMemTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad='1' AND Net.EnableNetTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad='1' AND Stor.EnableStorTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_CpuTestCriteria AS Cpu, CS_MemTestCriteria AS Mem, CS_NetTestCriteria AS Net, CS_StorTestCriteria AS Stor, CS_EnableTestLoad AS En"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Load Enable And Test Criteria Flags

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Invalid Input", "explanation": "Input enable load flags are not correct.", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Load generation and corresponding test criteria must both be enabled on at least one dimension.", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN Load.EnableCpuLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable CPU Load', Cpu.EnableCpuTestCriteria AS 'Enable CPU Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableMemLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Memory Load', Mem.EnableMemTestCriteria AS 'Enable Memory Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableNetLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Network Load', Net.EnableNetTestCriteria AS 'Enable Network Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableStorLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Storage Load', Stor.EnableStorTestCriteria AS 'Enable Storage Test Criteria' FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS Load, CS_CpuTestCriteria AS Cpu, CS_MemTestCriteria AS Mem, CS_NetTestCriteria AS Net, CS_StorTestCriteria AS Stor"}]}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NodesPerModel (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, NodesPerModel)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_ReservedInstances (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, ReservedInstances)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(DISTINCT CTN.Handle) AS NodesPerModel FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='ParentChild' AND CTN.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_NodesPerModel", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["CloudTemplateModelHnd", "NodesPerModel"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(*) AS ReservedInstances FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd AND CTI.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ReservedInstances", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["CloudTemplateModelHnd", "ReservedInstances"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN (SUM (CASE WHEN En.EnableCpuLoad THEN (CASE WHEN Cpu.MinCpuLoad != Cpu.MaxCpuLoad THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad THEN (CASE WHEN Mem.MinReadRate != Mem.MaxReadRate OR Mem.MinWriteRate != Mem.MaxWriteRate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad THEN (CASE WHEN Net.MinReadRate != Net.MaxReadRate OR Net.MinWriteRate != Net.MaxWriteRate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad THEN (CASE WHEN Stor.MinReadRate != Stor.MaxReadRate OR Stor.MinWriteRate != Stor.MaxWriteRate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END)) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En, CpuLoadConfig AS Cpu, MemoryLoadConfig AS Mem, NetworkLoadConfig AS Net, StorageLoadConfig AS Stor"}]}, "sql_operations": []}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Iter.Iteration AS Iteration, Iter.CurrVal AS CurrVal, (CASE WHEN En.EnableCpuLoad=1 THEN (Cpu.MinCpuLoad + ((Cpu.MaxCpuLoad - Cpu.MinCpuLoad) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal)) ELSE 0 END) AS CpuLoad, (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Mem.MinReadRate + ((Mem.MaxReadRate - Mem.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS MemReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableMemLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Mem.MinWriteRate + ((Mem.MaxWriteRate - Mem.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS MemWriteRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Net.MinReadRate + ((Net.MaxReadRate - Net.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS NetReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableNetLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Net.MinWriteRate + ((Net.MaxWriteRate - Net.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS NetWriteRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Stor.MinReadRate + ((Stor.MaxReadRate - Stor.MinReadRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS StorReadRate, (CASE WHEN En.EnableStorLoad=1 THEN (CAST (Stor.MinWriteRate + ((Stor.MaxWriteRate - Stor.MinWriteRate) * 0.01 * Iter.CurrVal) AS INTEGER)) ELSE 0 END) AS StorWriteRate FROM CpuLoadConfig AS Cpu, MemoryLoadConfig AS Mem, NetworkLoadConfig AS Net, StorageLoadConfig AS Stor, CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_EnableTestLoad AS En WHERE Cpu.ID = Mem.ID AND Cpu.ID = Net.ID AND Cpu.ID = Stor.ID"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterationLoad", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Iteration", "CurrVal", "CpuLoad", "MemReadRate", "MemWriteRate", "NetReadRate", "NetWriteRate", "StorReadRate", "StorWriteRate"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL Command (Update CS_IterationLoad)

Events.SessionId AS SessionId, Events.Event AS Event, Events.EventDescription AS EventDescription, Events.EventTextShort AS EventTextShort, Events.EventText AS EventText, Events.Iteration AS Iteration, Events.CurrVal AS CurrVal, Events.BllTimestamp AS BllTimestamp, CAST(Events.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, CS_Events AS Events, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Events.Iteration=Iter.Iteration AND Events.Event='start_iteration'"}]}}, "dst": [{"influx_db_add": {"db": "metrics", "include_session_token": false, spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Iter.Iteration AS Iteration, SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) AS InstanceCount, SUM(Model.AgentCount) AS AgentCount, Iter.CurrVal AS PercentSearchSpace, 'N/A' AS CpuLoad, 'N/A' AS MemReadRate, 'N/A' AS MemWriteRate, 'N/A' AS NetReadRate, 'N/A' AS NetWriteRate, 'N/A' AS StorReadRate, 'N/A' AS StorWriteRate, 'N/A' AS CpuVerdict, 'N/A' AS MemVerdict, 'N/A' AS NetVerdict, 'N/A' AS StorVerdict, 'N/A' AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_VerdictSummary", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "AgentCount", "PercentSearchSpace", "CpuLoad", "MemReadRate", "MemWriteRate", "NetReadRate", "NetWriteRate", "StorReadRate", "StorWriteRate", "CpuVerdict", "MemVerdict", "NetVerdict", "StorVerdict", "IterVerdict"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL Command (Update Verdict Summary Table)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuLoad=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableCpuLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN ROUND(Load.CpuLoad, 2) ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), MemReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableMemLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.MemReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), MemWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableMemLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.MemWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), NetReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableNetLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.NetReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), NetWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableNetLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.NetWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), StorReadRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableStorLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.StorReadRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration), StorWriteRate=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT En.EnableStorLoad FROM CS_EnableTestLoad AS En)=1 THEN Load.StorWriteRate ELSE 'N/A' END FROM CS_IterationLoad AS Load, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Load.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL Command (Update Verdict Summary Table)

TD.AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats AS TD WHERE TD.Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TD.Statistic IN ('CPU_UTILIZATION', 'CPU_VARIANCE')"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuAgentTdigestSumResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["AgentHostname", "Statistic", "MinVal", "MaxVal", "AvgVal"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT IterationNum, IteratorCurrVal, InstanceHnd, ThresholdResultsHnd, True, False, ROUND((True / (True + False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM CpuLoadIteration WHERE IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadVar", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "MinCpuLoad", "MaxCpuLoad", "TemplateId", "NodeId", "MachineGroupIndex", "MachineIndex", "NodeName", "LoadProfileName"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT AgentHostname, Iteration, Statistic, MinVal, MaxVal, AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND Statistic LIKE 'CPU%'"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "Tdigest_AgentCpuSummStats", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["AgentHostname", "Iteration", "Statistic", "Field", "MinVal", "MaxVal", "AvgVal"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (table rows per template)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ResErrMissingThresholdResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Dimension", "Measurement", "Template", "NodeCount", "ReservedInstanceCount", "AgentCount", "ExpectedAgentResultsCount", "ActualAgentResultsCount"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Update error table)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ErrCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (Res.True + Res.False) >=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ErrCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR WHERE TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1)"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (at least one measurement reported)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, Map.MachineSetName AS Template, TR.AgentHostname AS Agent FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ResErrZeroThresholdChecks", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Dimension", "Measurement", "Template", "Agent"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Update error table)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, CpuLoad, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudCpuLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT LoadIter.IterationNum AS Iteration, LoadIter.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, JT.CpuLoad AS CpuLoad, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, LoadIter.True AS True, LoadIter.False AS False, LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False AS TotalMeasurements, LoadIter.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - LoadIter.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN LoadIter.False/(LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False) * 100.0 >= TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, LoadIter.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudCpuLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS LoadIter, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd, LP.Utilization AS CpuLoad FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=LoadIter.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadVarResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "CurrVal", "CpuLoad", "AgentHostname", "AgentPort", "True", "False", "TotalMeasurements", "FailureRate", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict", "ThresholdResultsHnd", "CloudTemplateInstanceHnd", "CloudTemplateModelHnd", "CloudTemplateNodeHnd", "CloudCpuLoadProfileHnd", "CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd"]}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, AgentCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT SUM(Model.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS InstanceCount, (SELECT SUM(Model.AgentCount) FROM CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model) AS AgentCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadVarSum", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "AgentCount", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Sum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.AgentCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "AgentCount", "TotalAgentsChecked", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT (SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS Iteration, (SELECT Iter.CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter) AS CurrVal, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, ROUND(LP.Utilization, 2) AS CpuLoad FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP, (SELECT LP.Handle AS LpHnd, Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AS CtnHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudCpuLoadProfile AS LP WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle) AS LpMap WHERE LpMap.CtnHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LP.Handle=LpMap.LpHnd"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadProfSum", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "CurrVal", "ProfileName", "ModelName", "NodeName", "CpuLoad"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Iteration, CurrVal, ProfileName, ModelName, NodeName, CpuLoad FROM CS_CpuLoadProfSum"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadProfileRealTimeResults", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "CurrVal", "ProfileName", "ModelName", "NodeName", "CpuLoad"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, (SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS SearchSpacePercent, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.AgentCount AS AgentCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Iteration", "SearchSpacePercent", "InstanceCount", "AgentCount", "TotalAgentsChecked", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "IterVerdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(Res.CpuLoad, 2) AS CpuLoad, ROUND(TD.AvgVal * 100.0, 2) AS ActualAvgCpuLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, ROUND(Res.CpuLoad - (Res.CpuLoad * Res.AcceptableVariance / 100.0), 2) AS MinAcceptableCpuLoad FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentCpuSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='CPU_UTILIZATION' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentRealTimeResults", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "AgentHostname", "ModelName", "NodeName", "ProfileName", "CpuLoad", "ActualAvgCpuLoad", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "MinAcceptableCpuLoad"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuVerdict=(SELECT Res.IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults AS Res, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Res.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT 'Memory' AS Dimension, 'Write Latency' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, MII.AgentCount) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_MemWriteLat AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, (SELECT MachineSetHnd, group_concat(MachineSetName), ResourceId, CloudTemplateModelHnd FROM CS_MachineSetInstanceMap GROUP BY CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ResErrMissingThresholdResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Dimension", "Measurement", "Template", "NodeCount", "ReservedInstanceCount", "AgentCount", "ExpectedAgentResultsCount", "ActualAgentResultsCount"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Update error table)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ErrCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (Res.True + Res.False) >=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ErrCount FROM CS_MemWriteLat AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR WHERE TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1)"}]}, "sql_operations": []}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "CPU Load (%) Distribution Per Node", "explanation": "Observed CPU load (%) distribution across all agents per node per percentile.", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Template", "Node", "Mean", "Minimum", "Maximum", "P1", "P5", "P10", "P20", "P30", "P40", "P50", "P60", "P70", "P80", "P90", "P95", "P99", "P99.5", "P99.9", "P99.95", "P99.99"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Map.ModelDispName AS Template, Map.NodeName as Node, ROUND(TdRes.AvgVal * 100.0, 2) AS 'Mean', ROUND(TdRes.MinVal * 100.0, 2) AS 'Minimum', ROUND(TdRes.MaxVal * 100.0, 2) AS 'Maximum', ROUND(TdRes.Per1 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P1', ROUND(TdRes.Per5 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P5', ROUND(TdRes.Per10 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P10', ROUND(TdRes.Per20 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P20', ROUND(TdRes.Per30 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P30', ROUND(TdRes.Per40 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P40', ROUND(TdRes.Per50 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P50', ROUND(TdRes.Per60 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P60', ROUND(TdRes.Per70 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P70', ROUND(TdRes.Per80 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P80', ROUND(TdRes.Per90 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P90', ROUND(TdRes.Per95 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P99', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_5 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P99.5', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_9 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P99.9', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_95 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P99.95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_99 * 100.0, 2) AS 'P99.99' FROM CS_IterCpuLoadTdigestSumResults AS TdRes, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TdRes.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TdRes.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND TdRes.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd"}]}]}

StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_TestCriteria AS Criteria, CS_SecurityToken AS Token"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_Events", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["SessionId", "Event", "EventDescription", "EventTextShort", "EventText", "Iteration", "CurrVal", "BllTimestamp", "CpuLoadAcceptableVariance", "MemReadRateAcceptableVariance", "MemReadRateAcceptableLatency", "MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance", "MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency", spirent.methodology.ProcessDataCommand.InputJson: {"enable": true, "operation_list": [{"add_to_influx_db": {"enable": true, "src": {"sql": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Events.SessionId AS SessionId, Events.Event AS Event, Events.EventDescription AS EventDescription, Events.EventTextShort AS EventTextShort, Events.EventText AS EventText, Events.Iteration AS Iteration, Events.CurrVal AS CurrVal, Events.BllTimestamp AS BllTimestamp, CAST(Events.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_Events AS Events, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Events.Iteration=Iter.Iteration AND Events.Event='end_iteration'"}]}}, "dst": [{"influx_db_add": {"db": "metrics", "include_session_token": false, "measurement": "CLOUDSTRESS_BENCHMARK_FIXEDCOUNT_cs_bll_events", "tag_field_list": ["SessionId", "Event", "Iteration", "CurrVal", "CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt", "MemReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt", "MemWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt", "NetReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt", "NetWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt", "StorReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt", "StorWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt"]}}]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN EnableCpuTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad, CS_TestCriteria"}]}, "sql_operations": []}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "dest_db": {"dest_db_name": "SUMMARY", "dest_table_name": "CpuTestResult"}, "columns": ["LoadProfileName", "TemplateId", "TemplateName", "NodeName", "IsConverged", "CpuLoad"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT LoadConf.LoadProfileName AS LoadProfileName, LoadConf.TemplateId AS TemplateId, CASE WHEN LoadConf.TemplateId='' THEN '---' ELSE (SELECT ModelDispName FROM CS_ProfileMap WHERE ModelResId=LoadConf.TemplateId) END AS TemplateName, CASE WHEN LoadConf.TemplateId='' AND LoadConf.NodeId='' THEN '---' ELSE CASE WHEN NodeId='' THEN '---' ELSE LoadConf.NodeName END END AS NodeName, CASE WHEN IterRes.IsConverged=1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS IsConverged, ROUND(((LoadConf.MaxCpuLoad-LoadConf.MinCpuLoad) * (CASE WHEN IterRes.IsConverged=1 THEN IterRes.ConvergedVal ELSE IterRes.CurrVal END) / 100.0 + LoadConf.MinCpuLoad), 2) AS CpuLoad FROM CS_LoadIteratorResult AS IterRes, CpuLoadConfig AS LoadConf"}]}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"report": {"explanation": "Summary of methodology input values.", "display_name": "Test Configuration Summary", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT (SELECT SUM(ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ReservedInstances) AS 'Total Instance Count', (SELECT SUM(CS_NodesPerModel.NodesPerModel * CS_ReservedInstances.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_NodesPerModel JOIN CS_ReservedInstances ON CS_NodesPerModel.CloudTemplateModelHnd = CS_ReservedInstances.CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS 'Total Agent Count', Conf.Duration as 'Iteration Duration (sec)', Conf.InitialSearchValue as 'Initial Search Value (%)', Conf.SearchResolution as 'Search Resolution (%)', CASE WHEN Load.EnableCpuLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable CPU Load', Crit.EnableCpuTestCriteria AS 'Enable CPU Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableMemLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Memory Load', Crit.EnableMemTestCriteria AS 'Enable Memory Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableNetLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Network Load', Crit.EnableNetTestCriteria AS 'Enable Network Test Criteria', CASE WHEN Load.EnableStorLoad='1' THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS 'Enable Storage Load', Crit.EnableStorTestCriteria AS 'Enable Storage Test Criteria' FROM CS_TestConfiguration AS Conf, CS_EnableTestLoad AS Load, CS_TestCriteria AS Crit"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_Start (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_End (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_start_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_start_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "VM_Snapshot_Start", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["FlavorId", "FlavorName", "Count", "CpuCores", "MemoryMb", "DiskInfo"]}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_end_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_end_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "VM_Snapshot_End", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["FlavorId", "FlavorName", "Count", "CpuCores", "MemoryMb", "DiskInfo"]}}, {"report": {"explanation": "Summary of VM Snapshot information.", "display_name": "Running VMs Not Included in Test", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Start.FlavorName AS 'Name', Start.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Start.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Start.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Start.Count AS 'Start Count', (End.Count - Start.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Start, VM_Snapshot_End AS End WHERE Start.FlavorId=End.FlavorId"}, {"static": "UNION"}, {"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Info.Count AS 'Start Count', PRINTF('-%d', Info.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_End)"}, {"static": "UNION"}, {"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', 0 AS 'Start Count', Info.Count AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_End AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_Start)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}
